result.execSummary:
The defendant Kiara M. Murray was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kiara M. Murray is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Kiara M. Murray was found guilty of Burglary-Building or Dwelling [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.  If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.

Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.
*  Pay supervision fees.
*  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
*  Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.
Cooperate with the Child Support Agency to establish paternity and/or to pay child support and make all court appearances in any paternity action.  May not have contact with Victim.  DOC shall promptly notify the Court, in writing, of any new arrest or criminal charge made against the Deft.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Andrea Rufo.  Victim rights compliance.  Sentencing arguments made.  Sentence w/held; placed on probation for 3yrs consecutive to 15CF1125.  DNA ordered; notice given to deft.  Appeal rights.  Firearm warning.  Voting acknowledgment.  No restitution is requested.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Andrea Rufo.  Case is resolved.  Victim rights compliance.  Deft pleads guilty to count 1; found guilty by the Court.  Remaining count is dismissed on State's motion.  PSI ordered.  Sentencing set for 10/18/16 @ 10:30am

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Def. appeared (in custody)with Atty Andrea Rufo.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Case is not resolved.  Another FPT set for 9/6/16 at 9:30.  Case to remain on for jury selection on 9/26/16 at 9:00.  Bond continued.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Andrea Rufo.  Co-deft case has been remanded back to Intake Court for a prelim. hrg.  FPT adj to 8/19/16 @ 10am, JS 9/26/16 @ 9am.
FPT moved from 7/7 to 7/8/16 @ 10:45am due to court's unavailability; email sent to attys
Jury selection on July 25, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Final pre-trial on July 7, 2016 at 10:45 am.

Minutes:  NO RECORD TAKEN.  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Atty Rufo out ill.  Deft not transported from the KCJ.  FPT set for 7/7/16 @ 10:45am, JS 7/25/16 @ 9am along w/co-deft.  NTBS
Status conference on May 6, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Status conf adj to 5/6/16 @ 9:30am along w/co-deft case.  Defense atty out ill today; deft not transported from the KCJ

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Atty Andrea Rufo appeared on behalf of deft Kiara Murray (not transported from the KCJ).  Deft Medley appeared (10min late) w/Atty Donald Bielski.  Deft Medley was waived from JV court; defense counsel in JV court filed an appeal - briefs are due in February.  Atty Rufo's case is in limbo - her client filed a subst. of Judge Schroeder but was denied by the Court Comm since deft Medley is a co-deft.  Brief discussion held.  Any decision on subst. request will have to be delayed until April.  Per Court, set cases for status in April.  Status set for 4/11/16 @ 2pm.
Status conf moved from 9:30am to 10:30am due to ongoing trial; attys notified via email

Defendant Kiara M. Murray appeared with Attorney Andrea K Rufo.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Jessica L. Krejcarek appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JThwing. Minutes:  DE files request for substitution of Br 3; Court denies request as co-def has not filed substitution at this time.   Information filed, reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. Bond continued.  Case to be set for status hearing to address the substitution request and the co-def appeal of his juvenile case that was waived into adult court.  Status conference scheduled for January 20, 2016 at 09:30 am.
by DE of Br 3;   denied.

Defendant Kiara M. Murray appeared with Attorney Andrea K Rufo.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Jessica L. Krejcarek appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JThwing. Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found. Bound over.Bond continued.  Information to be filed at next hearing.  Arraignment scheduled for December 17, 2015 at 09:15 am.
